texto: 3.10 feedback <customer satisfaction> opinions, comments and expressions of interest in a product, a service or a complaints-handling process Note 1 to entry: Feedback can be given in relation to other processes where the organization (3.12) interacts with the customer (3.4). [SOURCE: ISO 9000:2015, 3.9.1, modified — Note 1 to entry has been added.] © ISO 2018 – All rights reserved 3 BS ISO 10003:2018 ISO 10003:2018.3.11 interested party stakeholder person or organization (3.12) that can affect, be affected by, or perceive itself to be affected by a decision or activity EXAMPLE Customers (3.4), owners, people in an organization, providers, bankers, regulators, unions, partners or society
